4399.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|77|58$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|the criminals|118|132|5641$فِى|(will be) in|89|103|89$عَذَابِ|(the) punishment|134|148|1160$جَهَنَّمَ|(of) Hell|73|87|2655$خَـٰلِدُونَ|abiding forever.|123|130|257$

4403.verse: لَقَدْ|Certainly,|83|94|3466$جِئْنَـٰكُم|We have brought you|163|186|15561$بِٱلْحَقِّ|the truth,|85|108|692$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|101|952$أَكْثَرَكُمْ|most of you,|104|127|5080$لِلْحَقِّ|to the truth|99|110|8144$كَـٰرِهُونَ|(are) averse.|107|107|7639$

4404.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|53|62$أَبْرَمُوٓاْ|have they determined|165|196|15562$أَمْرًا|an affair?|82|112|1085$فَإِنَّا|Then indeed, We|132|162|4856$مُبْرِمُونَ|(are) determined.|136|151|15563$

4405.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|60|62$يَحْسَبُونَ|(do) they think|120|164|11045$أَنَّا|that We|74|118|4147$لَا|(can) not|83|127|30$نَسْمَعُ|hear|72|116|15564$سِرَّهُمْ|their secret(s)|116|138|7772$وَنَجْوَٮٰهُم‌ۚ|and their private counsel(s)?|211|218|7773$بَلَىٰ|Nay,|54|67|772$وَرُسُلُنَا|and Our Messengers|154|167|15565$لَدَيْهِمْ|with them,|91|104|2856$يَكْتُبُونَ|are recording.|112|119|751$

4407.verse: سُبْحَـٰنَ|Glory be|86|92|10207$رَبِّ|(to the) Lord,|111|124|7$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|145|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth,|116|129|352$رَبِّ|(the) Lord|87|100|7$ٱلْعَرْشِ|(of) the Throne,|128|134|6451$عَمَّا|above what|98|333|724$يَصِفُونَ|they ascribe.|107|342|5904$

4408.verse: فَذَرْهُمْ|So leave them|115|128|5958$يَخُوضُواْ|(to) converse vainly|154|181|4558$وَيَلْعَبُواْ|and play|91|118|15568$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|91|526$يُلَـٰقُواْ|they meet|88|115|15569$يَوْمَهُمُ|their Day|80|93|15570$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|300|138$يُوعَدُونَ|they are promised|139|374|11281$

4410.verse: وَتَبَارَكَ|And blessed is|114|128|15571$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who -|119|146|138$لَهُۥ|to Whom|79|106|977$مُلْكُ|(belongs the) dominion|171|198|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|146|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|118|352$وَمَا|and whatever|111|126|46$بَيْنَهُمَا|(is) between both of them|195|210|3978$وَعِندَهُۥ|and with Him|105|120|5654$عِلْمُ|(is the) knowledge|143|150|9511$ٱلسَّاعَةِ|(of) the Hour,|112|191|7045$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|249|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|235|297$

4411.verse: وَلَا|And not|72|81|25$يَمْلِكُ|have power|97|115|4831$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|118|20$يَدْعُونَ|they invoke|97|115|1942$مِن دُونِهِ|besides Him|104|122|4463$ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ|(for) the intercession;|167|176|11311$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$مَن|who|50|92|76$شَهِدَ|testifies|73|115|1598$بِٱلْحَقِّ|to the truth,|104|146|692$وَهُمْ|and they|79|121|256$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|113|115$

4412.verse: وَلَئِن|And if|66|80|1309$سَأَلْتَهُم|you ask them|109|138|7702$مَّنْ|who|50|79|76$خَلَقَهُمْ|created them,|114|143|8784$لَيَقُولُنَّ|they will certainly say,|170|199|7703$ٱللَّهُ‌ۖ|`Allah.`|72|86|123$فَأَنَّىٰ|Then how|85|310|5860$يُؤْفَكُونَ|are they deluded?|139|364|5164$

4399.verse: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.

4400.verse: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.

4401.verse: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.

4402.verse: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."

4403.verse: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.

4404.verse: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].

4405.verse: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.

4406.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."

4407.verse: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.

4408.verse: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.

4409.verse: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.

4410.verse: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.

4411.verse: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.

4412.verse: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?

4413.verse: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."

4414.verse: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.
